text: Where do I pick my up order?

children.text: We will bring your order to the Round Square area, which is next to the SLC.
To pay for your order, you will have to come to the SLC between 12:45 and 1:30. You can pay with either cash, debit or credit. We also accept apple pay.

text: What happens if I don't pay?

children.text: If you do not pay for your order before lunch is over, we are unable to pick up your order and you will not recieve your food.

The delivery charge is based on the price of your order. If your order is between $0 - $5, there is $2 delivery. Between $5 - $10, $4 delivery. Between $10 - $20, $5 delivery. For orders over $20 there is a $7 delivery fee..

text: What happens if the restaurant doesn't have what I ordered?

children.text: If the restaurant you've ordered from does not have what you ordered, we will bring you the missing items on the following business day.
